question: Which body has launched a rural e-mobility programme, which urges people to switch to electric vehicles?
explanation:
CSC is a Special Purpose Vehicle (SPV) under the Ministry of Electronics and IT. It manages over 3.5 lakh common service centres (CSCs) across the country.
The CSC SPV has started a rural e-mobility programme, which urges people to switch to electric vehicles. The CSC e-Governance Services will facilitate loans for the purchase of electric vehicles. It will also focus on setting up charging infrastructure.
